title: MotoKare Mania
overview: Nanba Yurika is self immersed in her past memories with Saito Makoto, whom she broke up with five years ago. She claims to be an ex mania, a fan of her ex, and thinks that the imaginary Makoto she frequently dreams of helps her get through life. What a shock it is when she eventually reunites with the real Makoto at her new workplace.Â
